p: We used mice carrying a deletion in the Tmprss4 gene to study the role of TMPRSS4 during influenza virus infection in vivo. RT-PCR analysis of knockout lung tissue confirmed the absence of the full-length Tmprss4 transcript (data not shown). No protein was detected in knockout mice by immunohistochemical staining (data not shown). Tmprss4-deficient mice showed normal reproduction rates and development and growth patterns and had no obvious abnormal phenotype ( 19).
